code: import React from'react';import{Button}from'reactstrap';import{useChat}from'../contexts/ChatContext';import{useGroup}from'../contexts/GroupContext';import Swal from'sweetalert2';import{useTranslation}from'react-i18next';var ChangeGroupNameButton=function ChangeGroupNameButton(_ref){var newGroupName=_ref.newGroupName,setGroupName=_ref.setGroupName,actualMembers=_ref.actualMembers;var _useChat=useChat(),activeChat=_useChat.activeChat;var _useGroup=useGroup(),setChangeGroupData=_useGroup.setChangeGroupData;var _useTranslation=useTranslation(),t=_useTranslation.t;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Button,{color:"none",type:"button",onClick:function onClick(){return Swal.fire({title:t("Do you want to change the group name?"),text:newGroupName,icon:"warning",showCancelButton:true,confirmButtonColor:"#3085d6",cancelButtonColor:"#d33",confirmButtonText:t("Yes"),cancelButtonText:t("No"),customClass:{popup:"swal-mini-popup"}}).then(function(result){if(result.isConfirmed){Swal.fire({position:'center',icon:'success',title:'Changed!',showConfirmButton:false,timer:1500,customClass:{popup:"swal-mini-popup"}});setChangeGroupData({groupId:activeChat.groupId,groupName:newGroupName,members:actualMembers,description:"Descrição do grupo!"});setGroupName("");}else{setGroupName("");}});}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("i",{className:"ri-edit-line"}));};export default ChangeGroupNameButton;
